lexUnit.name: jog.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: run at a steady, gentle pace, especially as a form of exercise.

sentence.text: Then I told Springsteen not to invite any strangers in , or any of his friends for a party , put my flying jacket on and jogged downstairs to wind up Armstrong .
